author: Neill Ostrout Journal Inquirer
title: Steppin' out
text:
Jessica Hill UConn First Night 
Connecticut's Breanna Stewart, right, is guarded by Amida Brimah during an inter-squad scrimmage at the men's and women's basketball teams' First Night , Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in Storrs, Conn. (AP Photo/Jessica Hill) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 12:52 am Steppin' out By Neill Ostrout Journal Inquirer Journal   
STORRS — The University of Connecticut has tried to shed its image as a party school over the years, but some traditions are hard to do away with. 
The Huskies held their annual preseason celebration of basketball Friday night at Gampel Pavilion, with some 10,000 fans watching the men’s and women’s basketball teams “practice” for the start of the 2015-16 season. 
And this year’s even had just as much pomp and circumstance, as well as a distinct lack of defense, as the previous openers. kAm%62> v6?@ 362E %62> z6G:? eb\dc :?
